cluster_classes.class_description: Concepts describing the current era of pervasive digital technologies and the nature of human communication and interaction within this context.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: human communication as shaped by social media... in today's digital age characterized by widespread use of digital technologies

members.entity_description: The overall process, modes, and patterns of information exchange between people in contemporary society, including how social media shapes the ways individuals connect, share information, and interact.
The contemporary era characterized by widespread use of digital technologies and online connectivity.

cluster_classes.class_description: Concepts related to how information is accessed and engaged with, including the broad topics people follow and the processes that expand access to that information.
cluster_classes.evidence_excerpt: democratization of information has empowered individuals to be more informed and engaged in current events

members.entity_description: Ongoing news and developments that users become informed and engaged in.
Process where access to information becomes widely available beyond traditional gatekeepers.

args.new_description: Concepts describing the current era of pervasive digital technologies and the nature of human communication and interaction within this context.
args.new_class_group: Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society
args.justification: This class focuses on human communication and social interaction in today's digitally mediated society; assigning it to a Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society group connects it to related information-engagement concepts while preserving its distinct focus on societal context.

args.new_description: Concepts related to how information is accessed and engaged with, including the broad topics people follow and the processes that expand access to that information.
args.new_class_group: Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society
args.justification: This class captures how people access and engage with information (e.g., democratization of information, engagement with current events) in the modern context; aligning it to the same Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society group links it appropriately to the broader digital-society communication domain while keeping it as a distinct but related class.

executed_decisions.justification: This class focuses on human communication and social interaction in today's digitally mediated society; assigning it to a Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society group connects it to related information-engagement concepts while preserving its distinct focus on societal context.

executed_decisions.new_description: Concepts related to how information is accessed and engaged with, including the broad topics people follow and the processes that expand access to that information.
executed_decisions.new_class_group: Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society
executed_decisions.justification: This class captures how people access and engage with information (e.g., democratization of information, engagement with current events) in the modern context; aligning it to the same Digital Information & Communication in Contemporary Society group links it appropriately to the broader digital-society communication domain while keeping it as a distinct but related class.
